verses.text: Then came \w near|strong="H5066"\w* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, and unto the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

And they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto them at \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*, with the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* thereof for our \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* out of their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, at the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* and their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*.

And the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* for the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \add which were\add* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, had by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8099"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \add had\add* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* out of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, and out of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w* \add had\add* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* out of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, and out of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \add had\add* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which are \add here\add* \w mentioned|strong="H7121"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*,\f + \fr 21.9 \ft mentioned: Heb. called\f*

Which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \add being\add* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*, \add who were\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, had: for theirs was the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*.

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of \w Arba|strong="H0704"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*, which \add city is\add* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, in the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \add country\add* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, with the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* it.\f + \fr 21.11 \ft the city…: or, Kirjath-arba\f*

But the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* thereof, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* they to \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* for his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

¶ Thus they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \add to be\add* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* for the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w*; and \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
And \w Jattir|strong="H3492"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Eshtemoa|strong="H0851"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
And \w Holon|strong="H2473"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,\f + \fr 21.15 \ft Holon: also called, Hilen\f*

And \w Ain|strong="H5871"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Juttah|strong="H3194"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \add and\add* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* out of those \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.\f + \fr 21.16 \ft Ain: also called, Ashan\f*

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,\f + \fr 21.17 \ft Geba: also called, Gaba\f*

\w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Almon|strong="H5960"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 21.18 \ft Almon: also called, Alemeth\f*

All the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \add were\add* \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*.

¶ And the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* which \w remained|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, even they had the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of their \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

For they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \add to be\add* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* for the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w*; and \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,

And \w Kibzaim|strong="H6911"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w Eltekeh|strong="H0514"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Gibbethon|strong="H1405"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
\w Aijalon|strong="H0357"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Gath-rimmon|strong="H1667"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And out of the \w half|strong="H4276"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Tanach|strong="H8590"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Gath-rimmon|strong="H1667"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

All the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add were\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* for the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* that \w remained|strong="H3498"\w*.

¶ And unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, out of the \add other\add* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \add they gave\add* \w Golan|strong="H1474"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \add to be\add* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* for the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w*; and \w Beesh-terah|strong="H1203"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Kishon|strong="H7191"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Dabareh|strong="H1705"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
\w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w En-gannim|strong="H5873"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, \w Mishal|strong="H4861"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
\w Helkath|strong="H2520"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Rehob|strong="H7340"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w* in \w Galilee|strong="H1551"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \add to be\add* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* for the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w*; and \w Hammoth-dor|strong="H2576"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Kartan|strong="H7178"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

All the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \add were\add* \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*.

¶ And unto the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w Jokneam|strong="H3362"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, and \w Kartah|strong="H7177"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
\w Dimnah|strong="H1829"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Nahalal|strong="H5096"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.
And out of the tribe of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Bezer|strong="H1221"\w* with her suburbs, and \w Jahazah|strong="H3096"\w* with her suburbs,
\w Kedemoth|strong="H6932"\w* with her suburbs, and \w Mephaath|strong="H4158"\w* with her suburbs; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And out of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \add to be\add* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w refuge|strong="H4733"\w* for the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w*; and \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*,
\w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w* with her \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*; \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* in all.

So all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, which were \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, were \add by\add* their \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

All the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*.

These \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* were every \w one|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them: thus \add were\add* all these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and they \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* it, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* gave them \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, according to all that he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: and there \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of all their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* all their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

There \w failed|strong="H5307"\w* not \w ought|strong="H1697"\w* of any \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; all came to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*.
